about.summary: Create rich command line applications, with colors, headings, lists, alerts, progress bars, etc. It uses CSS for custom themes.

name: r-cliapp
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-cliapp
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/cliapp_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/cliapp/cliapp_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5e72bd9d22b11accb749c46bf216f271855ec306e0a4b322166ac7482ea55094

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-cli
    - r-crayon
    - r-fansi
    - r-glue >=1.3.0
    - r-prettycode
    - r-progress >=1.2.0
    - r-selectr
    - r-withr
    - r-xml2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-cli
    - r-crayon
    - r-fansi
    - r-glue >=1.3.0
    - r-prettycode
    - r-progress >=1.2.0
    - r-selectr
    - r-withr
    - r-xml2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('cliapp')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('cliapp')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/r-lib/cliapp#readme
  license: MIT
  summary: Create rich command line applications, with colors, headings, lists, alerts, progress bars, etc. It uses CSS for custom themes.
  license_family: MIT

  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - xhochy

# Package: cliapp
# Title: Create Rich Command Line Applications
# Version: 0.1.0
# Author: Gabor Csardi
# Maintainer: Gabor Csardi <csardi.gabor@gmail.com>
# Description: Create rich command line applications, with colors, headings, lists, alerts, progress bars, etc. It uses CSS for custom themes.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# LazyData: true
# URL: https://github.com/r-lib/cliapp#readme
# BugReports: https://github.com/r-lib/cliapp/issues
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Imports: cli, crayon, fansi, glue (>= 1.3.0), prettycode, progress (>= 1.2.0), R6, selectr, utils, withr, xml2
# Suggests: callr, covr, rstudioapi, testthat
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-12-05 09:41:39 UTC; gaborcsardi
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-12-16 14:40:05 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
